Specially prepared reagents create a concussive explosion when this sealed flask shatters.

Jolt Flask
Level 10 Uncommon

When it bursts, this flask creates a concussive wave that dazes your enemies.

Price: 200 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable): Standard Action. Make an attack: Area burst 1 within 10; +13 vs. Fortitude; on a hit, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
